messages.title: Build a brighter future
messages.content: Use your vote to STOP BREXIT. Together, we can build a brighter future.

messages.title: Stop Brexit
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats can take seats from the Tories and stop Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Argues that every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit.
Opposes inappropriate developments on the Green Belt.
Promises investment in schools and NHS to build a brighter future.
Aims to tackle the climate emergency by investing in renewable energy and insulating homes.

mentions.candidate: Andrew Gant is a local champion you can count on.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Stop Boris Johnson and his bad deal with Brexit.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can take seats from the Tories and stop Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit. Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit.

housing.content: Opposes inappropriate developments on the Green Belt.

images.caption: Andrew on the doorstep - listening to and standing up for Wolvercote
Andrew Gant and the Liberal Democrats understand what matters to people in Wolvercote
